channel.title: dubs.tech
channel.description: An infrequently updated blog on tech that currently interests me.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
Hello there, looks like you have found the very first post on this blog.

If you see this post consider yourself lucky, as it is going down as soon as the first actual post with content will go up. But before that can happen, the base has to work. So here we are, setting up the blog so content can flow freely into it.
